translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # 📦 create-docusaurus

translations.zh-CN: # 📦 create-docusaurus

segments.source_content: A scaffolding utility to help you instantly set up a functional Docusaurus app.

translations.zh-CN: 一个脚手架工具，可帮助您快速搭建功能完备的Docusaurus应用。

segments.source_content: ## Usage {#usage}

translations.zh-CN: ## 使用方法 {#usage}

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx create-docusaurus@latest [name] [template] [rootDir]
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ee201347

segments.source_content: The `name` argument will be used as the site's path as well as the `name` field in the created app's package.json. It can be an absolute path, or a path relative to `rootDir`.

translations.zh-CN: 参数`name`将同时作为站点路径和生成应用的package.json中的`name`字段值。可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对于`rootDir`的相对路径。

segments.source_content: The `template` argument can be one of the following:

translations.zh-CN: 参数`template`可选值包括：

segments.source_content:
- `classic`: Uses the classic template (recommended)
- `facebook`: Uses the Facebook/Meta template, which contains some Meta-specific setup
- A git repo URL (beginning with `https://` or `git@`), which can be cloned to the destination
- A local file path relative to CWD, which contains the files to be copied to destination

translations.zh-CN:
- `classic`：使用经典模板（推荐）
- `facebook`：使用Facebook/Meta模板，包含Meta特有的配置
- 以`https://`或`git@`开头的Git仓库URL（将克隆到目标目录）
- 相对于当前工作目录的本地文件路径（其内容将被复制到目标目录）

segments.source_content: The `rootDir` will be used to resolve the absolute path to the site directory. The default is CWD.

translations.zh-CN: 参数`rootDir`用于解析站点目录的绝对路径，默认为当前工作目录。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This command should be preferably used in an interactive shell so all features are available.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

建议在交互式shell中使用此命令以确保所有功能可用。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Options {#options}

translations.zh-CN: ## 选项 {#options}

segments.source_content: ### `-t, --typescript` {#typescript}

translations.zh-CN: ### `-t, --typescript` {#typescript}

segments.source_content: Used when the template argument is a recognized name. Currently, only `classic` provides a TypeScript variant.

translations.zh-CN: 当模板参数为预设名称时使用。目前仅`classic`模板提供TypeScript变体。

segments.source_content: ### `-g, --git-strategy` {#git-strategy}

translations.zh-CN: ### `-g, --git-strategy` {#git-strategy}

segments.source_content: Used when the template argument is a git repo. It needs to be one of:

translations.zh-CN: 当模板参数为Git仓库时使用，可选策略包括：

segments.source_content:
- `deep`: preserves full git history
- `shallow`: clones with `--depth=1`
- `copy`: does a shallow clone, but does not create a git repo
- `custom`: enter your custom git clone command. We will prompt you for it. You can write something like `git clone --depth 10`, and we will append the repository URL and destination directory.

translations.zh-CN:
- `deep`：保留完整Git历史记录
- `shallow`：使用`--depth=1`浅克隆
- `copy`：浅克隆但不初始化Git仓库
- `custom`：输入自定义git clone命令。我们将提示您输入类似`git clone --depth 10`的命令，并自动追加仓库URL和目标目录参数。

segments.source_content: ### `-p, --package-manager` {#package-manager}

translations.zh-CN: ### `-p, --package-manager` {#package-manager}

segments.source_content: Value should be one of `npm`, `yarn`, `pnpm`, or `bun`. If it's not explicitly provided, Docusaurus will infer one based on:

translations.zh-CN: 可选值为`npm`、`yarn`、`pnpm`或`bun`。若未显式指定，Docusaurus将根据以下条件推断：

segments.source_content:
- The lockfile already present in the CWD (e.g. if you are setting up website in an existing project)
- The command used to invoke `create-docusaurus` (e.g. `npm init`, `npx`, `yarn create`, `bunx`, etc.)
- Interactive prompting, in case all heuristics are not present

translations.zh-CN:
- 当前工作目录中已存在的锁文件（如在已有项目中搭建网站）
- 调用`create-docusaurus`时使用的命令（如`npm init`、`npx`、`yarn create`、`bunx`等）
- 当所有启发式条件都不满足时，将通过交互式提示选择

segments.source_content: ### `-s, --skip-install` {#skip-install}

translations.zh-CN: ### `-s, --skip-install` {#skip-install}

segments.source_content: If provided, Docusaurus will not automatically install dependencies after creating the app. The `--package-manager` option is only useful when you are actually installing dependencies.

translations.zh-CN: 若指定此参数，Docusaurus在创建应用后不会自动安装依赖。`--package-manager`选项仅在实际安装依赖时生效。
